actions.text: Reported to Senate from the Committee on Foreign Relations, S. Rept. 95-459.

actions.committee: Senate Committee on Rules and Administration
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Rules and Administration.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Rules and Administration, S. Rept. 95-549.
Placed on calendar in Senate under Measures Cleared to be Considered by Unanimous Consent.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in Senate.

official_title: An original resolution reported relating to certain expenses of the Committee on Foreign Relations.

summary.text: Amends Senate Resolution 91 (94th Congress) as amended by Senate Resolution 459 (94th Congress) to increase to $20,000 the fiscal year limitation on expenses which may be incurred by the Senate Committee on Foreign Relations to facilitate the interchange and reception of foreign dignitaries during 1977, and increases such limitation to $25,000 for fiscal year 1978.

titles.title: An original resolution reported relating to certain expenses of the Committee on Foreign Relations.
